course_description: The seminar introduces the health services research process, research design issues, ethical problems faced by researchers and the development of the MSPH thesis. Enrollment is limited to students admitted to the MSPH in health policy and health services research.
sections: Class Nbr: 1801, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 10-11:50a, Instructor: L. Gaydos, Status: Open
